div.a: School Closure and Materials Pickup Information

div.div: Packet Pick-up 2020 - School closure Coronavirus.pdfRead more...

BISD is making preparations in case of school closure due to the coronavirus. No decision has been made yet to go to remote/online learning, but we are preparing staff in case of such an event. The following survey is to gather information on our student's computer and internet access at home in ord...Read more...

div.a: Coronavirus Travel Information Survey for Students

div.div: Baird ISD is taking a proactive approach in order to prepare a response to COVID-19. The district has produced a survey accessible at the link below for parents, guardians, staff and community members in order to gather data about the potential risk of exposure without direct contact.
